section.section:
As soon as practicable after a hearing on a protest to a rule or regulation under § 21-242 of this subtitle, the Secretary shall:
Act on the protest by issuing an order; and
Send a copy of the order to each protester by certified mail, return receipt requested, bearing a postmark from the United States Postal Service.
Each order issued under this section shall be based on substantial evidence in the record of the hearing.

text.section:
An order issued by the Secretary under this section may:
Reinstate, rescind, or modify a State adopted federal rule or regulation as a rule or regulation of this State; or
As to any other rule or regulation proposed under this subtitle:
Withdraw the proposal;
Modify the proposal and set an effective date for the modified proposal that is at least 60 days after publication of the order; or
Set a new effective date for the original proposal that is at least 60 days after publication of the order.
